rows.label: tlk70000074_02_msg0001
rows.name:
His Majesty vested me with the duties
of special envoy on this occasion. I am
much obliged to him.

rows.label: tlk70000074_02_msg0002
rows.name:
The emperor's retainers on this warship
are the best this country has to offer.

rows.label: tlk70000074_02_msg0003
rows.name:
They consider it a great honor to be
chosen to serve the emperor.

rows.label: tlk70000074_02_msg0004
rows.name:
But the Special Inquisitor is different...
He is not working for Emperor Hugo,
but for his cold, callous brother.

rows.label: tlk70000074_02_msg0005
rows.name:
He's simply being used by that horrid
man to confirm Hugo's death and
reclaim the imperial Core Crystals.

rows.label: tlk70000074_02_msg0006
rows.name:
I have sworn from hence forth to
devote myself to serving the emperor...

rows.label: tlk70000074_02_msg0007
rows.name:
I beseech you to do all you can
to protect his life.
